summary: Female Bandit Khajiit Follower same stats with lydia and voice of lydia . That means 1 handed heavy armor follower
descriptionHtml: This mode adds  a follower at whiterun Dragonreach (see pictures). The follower is a female khajiit with iron equiped armor iron sword and iron shield named Khadia and has the voice of lydia if i have a lot of requests i may add a female voice khajiit at this follower  . Also the follower can reach level 80 . The only problem you may encounter is that it wont pop up dialogue saying follow me but this can be solve by entering command list with the key (~) and click on the khajiit and typing (addfac 5C84D 1) that solves the problem (see pictures for more details ). If there other problems please leave a comment and i will try to fix it if you liked leave a comment . Hope you enjoyed as much as i have. To install it you can either use the DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER button or you download it manually and place at data folder were it can be found at \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data then when you open skyrim and go at data files and then you select Female Bandit Khajiit Follower (if it is not already selected ) .
author: Garuger
